item.title: Problem is not fixed as you stated, 7th August

item.title: Swans possible hurt, 7th August
item.description:
2 Swan been here fir about a week, but today I see lots of loose feathers, cant see them moving, im worried if fox has been after them, they both laying down head tucked in, can they get checked pls

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Butts Wood Path, Thamesmead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Please Remove E-Bikes!, 7th August
item.description:
I have tried many times to highlight this problem but absolutely nothing is being done about it. Every day, literally hundreds of e-bikes fill the street and pavements causing huge inconvenience and hazard to pedestrians in particular. The problem is absolutely out of control. In addition to the obvious danger, every day this iconic street now looks like a total mess. It is absolutely unacceptable and reaching ridiculous extremes - the bikes not only are now also filling up adjacent streets: residents and businesses really are despairing. PLEASE can the council do something about it rather than assuming the bike companies will.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pall Mall, Victoria, London
Report on FixMyStreet
